select * from project_change as pc where pc.project_id in (select p.id from project as p where p.id in (select t.project_id from team as t where t.member_id =#{selectOwner,jdbcType=BIGINT})) and pc.status = 3
select * from project as p where p.id in (select t.project_id from team as t where t.member_id =#{selectOwner,jdbcType=BIGINT}) ORDER BY p.created DESC

select distinct(t2.member_id) from alm.team as t2 where t2.project_id in
